flawed_nl_solution:
In one hour, Addison mountain's temperature will decrease to 3/4 of the temperature it is now, meaning the temperature will decrease to 3/4*84=<<3/4*84=63>>63 degrees.
The temperature decrease will be 84-63=<<84-63=16>>16 degrees

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21, not 16. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
